a.title: 2019-2020 Retirees and Employees with 25 Years of Service

div.div: 2019-2020 Retirees and Employees with 25 Years of Service

div.p: Curious about online learning and the radio graduation ceremony? Listen as Superintendent Exline explains that students are still reading, writing, doing math and moving for physical education. She also shares some of the creative things teachers are doing in this new learning environment. Details about the 99KG radio graduation celebration and the photo opportunity to take place later are included as well. Check out this video and be sure to keep any eye out for information coming soon about our new podcast. #Why305
